t: Amazon Bay Area layoffs to impact dozens in Sunnyvale
s: 2 weeks ago - (KRON) — Amazon is potentially laying off a few dozen employees at different facilities across Sunnyvale, according to state filings. Just over 50 workers look set to lose their jobs this summer, a filing on the Employment Development Department website indicates.
